name: Celesti
description:
Inspired by Missile Command, Celesti was an attempt to lean into physics and mobile controls to bring something fresh to the formula. 

Originally made in 2014 during the emergence of HTML5 game portals. I have added it to Itch as a way of preserving it from tech decay. Of note: when this was originally made sound was not guaranteed to work on mobile web, so it was never given any audio.

Thanks to CRIMEMAN from tracking me down and showing it was still worth having available to play!

-Ryan
